Desc.entry: Affiliated to the Royal Yachting Association. Is a RYA/Volvo Champion club. Organises safety boat familiarisation, sailing, first aid, race organisation, powerboat and instructor courses. Also has a junior fleet which actively co-operates with the RYA to provide regional youth training.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Wednesday evenings, Friday evenings (summertime only), Saturday & Sunday all day (except Jan & Feb)
